This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library('tidyverse')
library('chron')
library('resample')
library('ggplot2')
library('scales')

dados = read_csv('github-users-committing-filetypes.csv')
View(dados)

dados <- dados %>% mutate(data = sprintf("%d-%d-%d", the_year, the_month, month_day)) %>% filter(complete.cases(.))

dados_py <- dados %>% filter(file_extension == 'py')
dados_js <- dados %>% filter(file_extension == 'js')

amostra_py = sample_n(dados_py, 300)
amostra_js = sample_n(dados_py, 300)

boot_py <- bootstrap(amostra_py, mean(users))
CI.bca(boot_py, probs = c(.025, .975))

boot_js <- bootstrap(amostra_js, mean(users))
CI.bca(boot_js, probs = c(.025, .975))


boot_py <- bootstrap(amostra_py %>% filter(is.weekend(data)), mean(users))
CI.bca(boot_py, probs = c(.025, .975))

boot_py <- bootstrap(amostra_py %>% filter(!is.weekend(data)), mean(users))
CI.bca(boot_py, probs = c(.025, .975))

boot_js <- bootstrap(amostra_js %>% filter(is.weekend(data)), mean(users))
CI.bca(boot_js, probs = c(.025, .975))

boot_js <- bootstrap(amostra_js %>% filter(!is.weekend(data)), mean(users))
CI.bca(boot_js, probs = c(.025, .975))


```
